SoundPEATS RunFree Lite2 Open-Ear Air Conduction Sport Neckband

The SoundPEATS RunFree Lite2 Open-Ear Air Conduction Sport Neckband provides the ideal combination of comfort and high-quality audio for your active lifestyle. These earbuds include an open-ear design that provides all-day comfort while keeping you aware of your surroundings. Experience excellent Hi-Res audio with deep bass to enhance your music and audio material. Enjoy robust dual-device connectivity thanks to Bluetooth 5.3 technology, which allows you to smoothly move between devices. With up to 15 hours of continuous playback on a single charge, you may listen to music uninterrupted throughout the day. The earphones also provide crystal clear transmission, resulting in crisp conversations with improved bass. The SoundPEATS RunFree Lite 2 provides long-lasting comfort, an outstanding audio experience, and dependable connection all in one sleek and athletic neckband design.

Superior Audio With Enhanced Bass

With 16.2mm PU + Biofilm ultra-large dynamic drivers and superior directional sound technology of SoundPEATS RunFree Lite2, you may enjoy unparalleled sound quality. Dive into clean, immersive music with deep, resonant bass, taking your listening experience to new heights. Feel the vigor and vibrancy of your music as each beat reverberates with force and clarity.

Crystal Clear Communication

This SoundPEATS RunFree Lite2 headphones use superior dual-mic technology to provide crystal-clear calls even in loud surroundings. Background noise is reduced, ensuring that your voice is heard clearly, making each conversation simple and pleasurable.

Extended Playback Time

Enjoy the equivalent of three marathon listening sessions with up to 15 hours of continuous playback. With a 2-hour charging period, this SoundPEATS RunFree Lite2 neckband are quickly and effectively charged, guaranteeing they're always ready to join you on every excursion and keep your music with you at all times. Note: Actual battery life may vary depending on usage, with the indicated time based on use with Android smartphones at 60% volume.

Seamless Multipoint Connectivity

Bluetooth 5.3 technology of SoundPEATS RunFree Lite2 neckband ensures a robust wireless connection for flawless music streaming and conversations. Enjoy the extra convenience of multi-point connection, which allows you to connect to numerous devices at the same time, increasing your versatility and convenience.

full_description:
SoundPEATS Q35 HD Wireless Neckband

The SoundPEATS Q35 HD Wireless Neckband earbuds are designed to be the ideal companion for your normal workout routine. Designed to withstand sweat, rain, and high waterproofness, these sports headphones are built to survive during intense physical activity. The most recent Qualcomm 3034 CPU and Bluetooth 5.0 are features of the SoundPEATS Q35 HD. It works with the Qualcomm APTX-HD codec, which when combined with a 10mm speaker yields high-fidelity sound. Anticipate crisp highs, strong bass, and clear mids for an immersive sonic experience. The magnetic earbuds make it easy to store them while not in use. They may cling to one another, which lessens the possibility of tangling and makes carrying them about simpler. With its tasteful use of magnets, the charging hole improves its water resistance. In addition to having a stylish appearance, its design guarantees a safe charging connection. With its improved polymer lithium battery and low-power processor, the Q35 HD can run for up to 14 hours on a single charge. With less than two hours needed to reach full capacity, charging is effective. Note: To extend battery life, stay away from rapid chargers. Customized soft silicone ear tips and fins that fit snugly and comfortably to keep the headphones from slipping out during strenuous exercises are included with the headphones. With its ability to hold its form and keep the earbuds in place, the in-ear memory wire is ideal for runners. With increased sweat resistance both inside and out, these earbuds are more dependable than before and provide a longer playback duration to support everyday activities and your workout without the need for regular recharging. The SoundPEATS Q35 HD Wireless Neckband headphones combine premium sound quality, durability, and comfort, making them an excellent choice for sports and active individuals. They include characteristics such as long battery life, magnetic design, and waterproof performance that make them resistant to the rigors of everyday use and strenuous exercises. Whether you're biking, running, or working out, the Q35 HD's immersive music keeps you inspired and invigorated.

full_description:
SoundPEATS RunFree Lite Open-Ear Air Conduction Sport Neckband

The SoundPEATS RunFree Lite Air Conduction Sport Headphone let you enjoy freedom. This neckband offers music while maintaining your sense of direction thanks to its open-ear design and Air Conduction Technology. These sports headphones provide immersive sound for workout with its 16.2mm driver, Bass Enhancement Tech, and 17-hour battery life. For reliable connectivity and Multi-Point Pairing, the ergonomic, lightweight design makes use of Bluetooth 5.3. They are ideal for numerous activities and are IPX4 waterproof and sweatproof.

Air Conduction Tech

The SoundPEATS RunFree Lite are air-conduction headphones are designed specifically for sports. Unlike conventional in-ear or over-ear sports headphones, the open-ear design allows you to listen to music while remaining aware of your surroundings, offering the highest level of safety. The headphones also have directional sound transmission technology to reduce sound leakage and protect your privacy.

16.2mm Large Driver

The SoundPEATS RunFree Lite Air Conduction Sport Headphone features a 16.2mm driver and patented bass enhancement technology. It provides a powerful, immersive audio experience. With a 17-hour battery life, you can stay motivated and entertained during your workout.

Bud-Free Comfort

SoundPEATS RunFree Lite Open Ear Headphones use air conduction technology to give a comfortable and painless listening experience. Even on the hottest of runs, you won't have to worry about overheated ears. These headphones are designed for all-day comfort and weigh only 28 g.

Advanced BT 5.3 Multipoint Connection

The SoundPEATS RunFree Lite Bluetooth 5.3 headphones offer a faster, more consistent connection while consuming less power. With Multi-Point Connection, you can pair with two Bluetooth devices at the same time and simply switch between two paired devices to answer calls while viewing movies on a PC with a single click on the headphones.

Sweatproof and Secure Fit

The SoundPEATS RunFree Lite sports headphone features a skin-friendly liquid silicone neckband that ensures a snug fit for any sport. The neckband is also IPX4 waterproof, meaning it can withstand mild rain and sweat while jogging, running, driving, cycling, or hiking.
